data.name: Content_Line1
data.value: The most popular contracts usually have an hourly/daily rate and unpaid vacation.

data.name: Content_Line2
data.value: Rarely, some companies contract for a fixed monthly rate. e.g. 15,000 PLN every month while offering paid vacation for let's say 20 days.

data.name: Content_Line3
data.value: When using the monthly rate, the change in vacation days affects the effective hourly rate:

data.name: Content_Line4
data.value: - 10,000 PLN/m + 20 days of paid vacation = 64.66 PLN/hour.

data.name: Content_Line5
data.value: - 10,000 PLN/m + 40 days of paid vacation = 70.76 PLN/hour (because you work less and still get 10k/m)
